data.title: Ryan Serhant Says His 'Greatest Investment Of All Time' Was Going 'Heavy' Into Bitcoin At $3,000 And $16,000
data.description: Ryan Serhant is best known for his prowess as a real estate salesman, but he says his best investments are not made of brick and mortar. “I had a friend who is a big crypto trader who I always thought was crazy and he convinced me to go heavy into ...
data.keywords: Ryan Serhant, investing in Bitcoin, Iced Coffee, real estate, Morgan Freeman, best investments, Bitcoin
